segments.text: I want to have the overcoat made to measure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , sir . Have you brought the cloth ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't know which one to choose . I think maybe you can help me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I recommend you to choose the 100 % cotton .
segments.speaker: S2
